languages.text: "В зоне гравитационного воздействия звезды находятся обломки крупного корабля — предположительно из флота Империума. Среди останков присутствует сигнатура исправного судового компонента. Кроме того, телеметрия показывает многочисленные биологические маркеры во внутренних помещениях, хотя вблизи отсутствуют какие-либо исправные суда".

"Wreckage of a large ship drifts lifelessly inside the star's gravity well, presumably a former vessel of the Imperium. Scans detect the signature of a functioning ship component among the debris. Additionally, telemetry has revealed numerous biological markers inside its compartments despite there being no operational vessels in the vicinity."
languages.original_text: "В зоне гравитационного воздействия звезды находятся обломки крупного корабля — предположительно из флота Империума. Среди останков присутствует сигнатура исправного судового компонента. Кроме того, телеметрия показывает многочисленные биологические маркеры во внутренних помещениях, хотя вблизи отсутствуют какие-либо исправные суда".

traits.locale_text: "There is a wreckage of a large ship inside the zone of the star's gravitational pull, presumably a former vessel of the Imperium. There is a signature of a functioning vessel component among the debris. Additionally, the telemetry has revealed numerous biological markers inside its compartments despite there being no operational vessels in the vicinity."

"There is a wreckage of a large ship inside the zone of the star's gravitational pull, presumably a former vessel of the Imperium. There is a signature of a functioning vessel component among the debris. Additionally, the telemetry has revealed numerous biological markers inside its compartments despite there being no operational vessels in the vicinity."

"Wreckage of a large ship drifts lifelessly inside the star's gravity well, presumably a former vessel of the Imperium. Scans detect the signature of a functioning ship component among the debris. Additionally, telemetry has revealed numerous biological markers inside its compartments despite there being no operational vessels in the vicinity."

"Wreckage of a large ship drifts lifelessly inside the star's gravity well, presumably a former vessel of the Imperium. Scans detect the signature of a functioning ship component among the debris. Additionally, telemetry has revealed numerous biological markers inside its compartments despite there being no operational vessels in the vicinity."

"Wreckage of a large ship drifts lifelessly inside the star's gravity well, presumably a former vessel of the Imperium. Scans detect the signature of a functioning ship component among the debris. Additionally, telemetry has revealed numerous biological markers inside its compartments despite there being no operational vessels in the vicinity."

languages.text: « L'épave d'un vaisseau de grande taille est actuellement à la dérive dans le puits gravitationnel de l'étoile ; un ancien bâtiment de l'Imperium, selon toute vraisemblance. Nos instruments ont détecté la signature énergétique d'un composant encore opérationnel parmi les débris. De plus, les données télémétriques indiquent la présence de plusieurs marqueurs biologiques dans les compartiments, et ce, malgré l'absence de vaisseau opérationnel dans la zone. »
languages.original_text: "Wreckage of a large ship drifts lifelessly inside the star's gravity well, presumably a former vessel of the Imperium. Scans detect the signature of a functioning ship component among the debris. Additionally, telemetry has revealed numerous biological markers inside its compartments despite there being no operational vessels in the vicinity."

traits.locale_text: « L'épave d'un vaisseau de grande taille est actuellement à la dérive dans le puits gravitationnel de l'étoile ; un ancien bâtiment de l'Imperium, selon toute vraisemblance. Nos instruments ont détecté la signature énergétique d'un composant encore opérationnel parmi les débris. De plus, les données télémétriques indiquent la présence de plusieurs marqueurs biologiques dans les compartiments, et ce, malgré l'absence de vaisseau opérationnel dans la zone. »

languages.text: “某艘大型飞船的残骸在恒星引力井内毫无生气地漂流着，估计是帝国的旧船。扫描结果显示，残骸中还有一个正常运转的飞船部件。此外，遥测结果显示船舱内有大量生物印记，但附近并没有正常运行的船只。”
languages.original_text: "Wreckage of a large ship drifts lifelessly inside the star's gravity well, presumably a former vessel of the Imperium. Scans detect the signature of a functioning ship component among the debris. Additionally, telemetry has revealed numerous biological markers inside its compartments despite there being no operational vessels in the vicinity."

traits.locale_text: “某艘大型飞船的残骸在恒星引力井内毫无生气地漂流着，估计是帝国的旧船。扫描结果显示，残骸中还有一个正常运转的飞船部件。此外，遥测结果显示船舱内有大量生物印记，但附近并没有正常运行的船只。”

languages.text: "Wrackteile eines großen Schiffs treiben leblos in einer Schwertkraftquelle umher. Vermutlich handelt es sich um ein ehemaliges Schiff des Imperiums. Scans zeigen zwischen all dem Schutt auch die Signatur eines funktionierenden Schiffsbauteils. Darüber hinaus hat die Telemetrie eine Reihe biologischer Marker in den Modulen gezeigt, obwohl es keine funktionsfähigen Schiffe in der Umgebung gibt."
languages.original_text: "Wreckage of a large ship drifts lifelessly inside the star's gravity well, presumably a former vessel of the Imperium. Scans detect the signature of a functioning ship component among the debris. Additionally, telemetry has revealed numerous biological markers inside its compartments despite there being no operational vessels in the vicinity."

traits.locale_text: "Wrackteile eines großen Schiffs treiben leblos in einer Schwertkraftquelle umher. Vermutlich handelt es sich um ein ehemaliges Schiff des Imperiums. Scans zeigen zwischen all dem Schutt auch die Signatur eines funktionierenden Schiffsbauteils. Darüber hinaus hat die Telemetrie eine Reihe biologischer Marker in den Modulen gezeigt, obwohl es keine funktionsfähigen Schiffe in der Umgebung gibt."

languages.text: «Hay restos de una gran nave flotando a la deriva en el pozo gravitatorio de la estrella, y se cree que es una antigua nave del Imperium. Los escáneres han detectado un componente de nave todavía en funcionamiento entre los restos. Por otro lado, la telemetría muestra múltiples marcadores biológicos dentro de sus compartimentos a pesar de no haber naves volando por la zona».
languages.original_text: "Wreckage of a large ship drifts lifelessly inside the star's gravity well, presumably a former vessel of the Imperium. Scans detect the signature of a functioning ship component among the debris. Additionally, telemetry has revealed numerous biological markers inside its compartments despite there being no operational vessels in the vicinity."

traits.locale_text: «Hay restos de una gran nave flotando a la deriva en el pozo gravitatorio de la estrella, y se cree que es una antigua nave del Imperium. Los escáneres han detectado un componente de nave todavía en funcionamiento entre los restos. Por otro lado, la telemetría muestra múltiples marcadores biológicos dentro de sus compartimentos a pesar de no haber naves volando por la zona».

languages.text: 「大型船の残骸が、星の重力という泉の中を力なく漂っています。おそらく帝国の昔の船でしょう。スキャンから、残骸の中に機能している船の部品の信号を検出しました。さらに遠隔測定器で、付近に稼働している船はないというのに、その部品内に多数の生物学的指標が写し出されています」
languages.original_text: "Wreckage of a large ship drifts lifelessly inside the star's gravity well, presumably a former vessel of the Imperium. Scans detect the signature of a functioning ship component among the debris. Additionally, telemetry has revealed numerous biological markers inside its compartments despite there being no operational vessels in the vicinity."

traits.locale_text: 「大型船の残骸が、星の重力という泉の中を力なく漂っています。おそらく帝国の昔の船でしょう。スキャンから、残骸の中に機能している船の部品の信号を検出しました。さらに遠隔測定器で、付近に稼働している船はないというのに、その部品内に多数の生物学的指標が写し出されています」

languages.text: "Büyük bir geminin enkazı, yıldızın çekim alanında cansızca sürükleniyor. Tahminen eski bir İmparatorluk gemisi. Taramalar sonucunda harabenin içerisinde çalışan gemi bileşenleri tespit edildi. Ayrıca telemetri, çevrede faal durumda bir gemi bulunmamasına rağmen kompartımanlarında birçok biyolojik işaret açığa çıkardı."
languages.original_text: "Wreckage of a large ship drifts lifelessly inside the star's gravity well, presumably a former vessel of the Imperium. Scans detect the signature of a functioning ship component among the debris. Additionally, telemetry has revealed numerous biological markers inside its compartments despite there being no operational vessels in the vicinity."
